data.text: @SenJohnHoeven @NDSUPresident @NDSUfootball @MountainWest @IowaStateU @NDSU President Cook making decisions as a lame duck president on his way to Iowa State!  @brentblum @ChrisMWilliams

@dawg_the @SenJohnHoeven Yep hold on to the one thing you guys have one us in 20 years of D1 football😂. We won 10 nattys time to go play big time football. You guys worry about trying to win the FCS maybe since we r gone lil bro.
@dawg_the @SenJohnHoeven Well now you don’t have to deal with losing to us every year
@SenJohnHoeven @NDSUPresident @NDSUfootball @MountainWest @IowaStateU @NDSU @SenJohnHoeven, time to put pressure on Thune to pass the Save America Act.   Get that done for America and North Dakota!
@SenJohnHoeven The state of North Dakota also likes UND-NDSU football matchups on the field…
@SenJohnHoeven @NDSUPresident @NDSUfootball @MountainWest @IowaStateU @NDSU Secure our elections, pass the Save Act!
